{'content_type': 'audio_transcription', 'text': "Alright GPT, it's fine to review everything you know about the BATES project that I'm working on in Mooselid. Can you give me an update on the background and where I'm at in the report writing?", 'direction': 'in', 'decoding_id': None}
User is working on the BEIT project in Mosul.

{'content_type': 'audio_transcription', 'text': "The BEIT project you're working on in Mosul focuses on sustainable housing and reconstruction. The curriculum you've developed emphasizes retrofitting modern buildings with heritage strategies, focusing on sustainability practices from the past. You've also integrated gender equality, job opportunities, and entrepreneurship training into the program. You've conducted validation sessions for your curriculum and sought expert feedback to ensure alignment with the Green Ziggurat Rating System (GZRS).\n\nAs for your report writing, you've been working on articulating the project's objectives, curriculum structure, and alignment with local needs and sustainability goals. Is there a specific aspect of the report you'd like to discuss or need help with?", 'direction': 'out', 'decoding_id': None}
